this_title: Alain Corneau, du noir au bleu
trans_title: 阿兰·科诺，从黑色到蓝色
introduction: This documentary will showcase Alain Corneau's style, films (Police Python 357, Choice of Arms, Série noire, Fort Saganne, Nocturne indien, All the Mornings of the World, Fear and Trembling, The Second Wind) and his favorite themes : music, the quest for identity, being left adrift, human loneliness, the difficulty to find happiness, death. It's both a minute examination and an exploration of the human condition.
chinese_title: 阿兰·科诺，从黑色到蓝色
foreign_title: Alain Corneau, du noir au bleu
